trans-unit.source: Quasar Framework will generate an SSR app (with optional PWA handoff) that leverages its best-in-class build system, sensible configuration and developer extensibility to make designing and building your idea a breeze. With over one hundred specific “Material Design 2.0”-compliant components, you can decide which ones to execute on the server, which are available in the browser - and even manage the <meta> tags of your site. Quasar is a node.js and webpack based development environment that supercharges and streamlines rapid development of SPA, PWA, SSR, Electron and Cordova apps - all from one codebase.
trans-unit.target: Quasar Framework将生成一个SSR应用程序（具有可选的PWA切换功能），该应用程序将利用其一流的构建系统，合理的配置和开发人员的可扩展性使设计和构建想法变得轻而易举。借助一百多种与“材料设计2.0”兼容的特定组件，您可以决定在服务器上执行哪些组件，在浏览器中可用哪些组件，甚至管理网站的 <meta> 标签。Quasar是一个基于node.js和webpack的开发环境，可增强和简化SPA，PWA，SSR，Electron和Cordova应用程序的快速开发-全部来自一个代码库。

trans-unit.source: <MyComponent> is more visually distinct from a single-word HTML element than <my-component>, because there are two character differences (the two capitals), rather than just one (a hyphen).
trans-unit.target: <MyComponent> 与 <my-component> 相比，<MyComponent>在视觉上与单个单词HTML元素区别更大，因为存在两个字符差异（两个大写字母），而不仅仅是一个字符（连字符）。

<slot> 组件

trans-unit.source: <slot> serve as content distribution outlets in component templates. <slot> itself will be replaced.
trans-unit.target: <slot> 用作组件模板中的内容分发出口。 <slot> 本身将被替换。

trans-unit.source: <transition> serve as transition effects for single element/component. The <transition> only applies the transition behavior to the wrapped content inside; it doesn’t render an extra DOM element, or show up in the inspected component hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: <transition> 用作单个元素/组件的过渡效果。所述 <transition> 仅适用的过渡行为对包装内容内; 它不会呈现额外的DOM元素，也不会显示在检查的组件层次结构中。

trans-unit.source: <transition-group> serve as transition effects for multiple elements/components. The <transition-group> renders a real DOM element. By default it renders a <span>, and you can configure what element it should render via the tag attribute.
trans-unit.target: <transition-group> 用作多个元素/组件的过渡效果。所述 <transition-group> 呈现一个真实DOM元素。默认情况下，它呈现 <span> ，并且您可以通过 tag 属性配置应呈现的元素。

trans-unit.source: <transition-group> supports moving transitions via CSS transform. When a child’s position on screen has changed after an update, it will get applied a moving CSS class (auto generated from the name attribute or configured with the move-class attribute). If the CSS transform property is “transition-able” when the moving class is applied, the element will be smoothly animated to its destination using the FLIP technique.
trans-unit.target: <transition-group> 支持通过CSS变换移动过渡。更新后孩子在屏幕上的位置发生更改时，将应用一个移动的CSS类（从 name 属性自动生成或使用 move-class 属性配置）。如果在应用移动类时CSS transform 属性为“可转换”，则将使用FLIP技术将元素平滑地动画化为其目的地。

trans-unit.source: v-if is “real” conditional rendering because it ensures that event listeners and child components inside the conditional block are properly destroyed and re-created during toggles.

trans-unit.source: v-if is also lazy: if the condition is false on initial render, it will not do anything - the conditional block won’t be rendered until the condition becomes true for the first time.
trans-unit.target: v-if 也是惰性的：如果条件在初始渲染时为假，则它将不执行任何操作-在条件首次变为真之前，将不渲染条件块。

trans-unit.source: Slot props allow us to turn slots into reusable templates that can render different content based on input props. This is most useful when you are designing a reusable component that encapsulates data logic while allowing the consuming parent component to customize part of its layout.
trans-unit.target: 插槽道具可让我们将插槽变成可重复使用的模板，这些模板可根据输入道具来呈现不同的内容。当您设计一个可重用的组件来封装数据逻辑，同时允许使用方父组件自定义其布局的一部分时，这非常有用。

trans-unit.source: Soon, we’ll also provide tips for enforcement. Sometimes you’ll simply have to be disciplined, but wherever possible, we’ll try to show you how to use ESLint and other automated processes to make enforcement simpler.
trans-unit.target: 不久，我们还将提供执行技巧。有时，您只需要纪律处分，但是在可能的情况下，我们将尝试向您展示如何使用ESLint和其他自动化流程来简化实施。

trans-unit.source: Use module scoping to keep private functions inaccessible from the outside. If that’s not possible, always use the $_ prefix for custom private properties in a plugin, mixin, etc that should not be considered public API. Then to avoid conflicts with code by other authors, also include a named scope (e.g. $_yourPluginName_).
trans-unit.target: 使用模块作用域来防止私有功能从外部无法访问。如果无法做到这一点，请始终将 $_ 前缀用于不应被视为公共API的插件，mixin等中的自定义私有属性。然后，为避免与其他作者的代码冲突，还应包括一个命名范围（例如 $_yourPluginName_ ）。

trans-unit.source: Vuex 1.0 is mostly backwards-compatible, so requires very few changes to upgrade. It is recommended for those with large existing codebases or who want the smoothest possible upgrade path to Vue 2.0. This guide is dedicated to facilitating that process, but only includes migration notes. For the complete usage guide, see the Vuex 1.0 docs.
trans-unit.target: Vuex 1.0主要是向后兼容的，因此只需很少更改即可升级。对于那些拥有大量现有代码库或想要尽可能平滑地升级到Vue 2.0的用户，建议使用它。本指南专用于促进该过程，但仅包括迁移说明。有关完整的用法指南，请参见Vuex 1.0 docs。

trans-unit.source: Vuex 2.0 is a radical redesign and simplification of the API, for those who are starting new projects or want to be on the cutting edge of client-side state management. It is not covered by this migration guide, so you should check out the Vuex 2.0 docs if you’d like to learn more about it.
trans-unit.target: Vuex 2.0是对API的彻底重新设计和简化，适合那些正在开始新项目或希望站在客户端状态管理的最前沿的人。本迁移指南并未涵盖它，因此，如果您想了解更多有关Vuex 2.0文档的信息，请查阅。

trans-unit.source: Watch a repo you care about. This will send you notifications whenever there’s activity in that repository, giving you insider knowledge about ongoing discussions and upcoming features. It’s a fantastic way to build expertise so that you’re eventually able to help address issues and pull requests.
trans-unit.target: 观看您关心的回购。只要该存储库中有活动，它就会向您发送通知，从而为您提供有关正在进行的讨论和即将推出的功能的内幕知识。这是一种建立专业知识的绝妙方法，因此您最终可以帮助解决问题和提出请求。

trans-unit.source: Whenever a build system is available to concatenate files, each component should be in its own file.
trans-unit.target: 只要有可用的构建系统来连接文件，每个组件都应位于其自己的文件中。

trans-unit.source: You may want to add one empty line between multi-line properties, particularly if the options can no longer fit on your screen without scrolling.
trans-unit.target: 您可能想在多行属性之间添加一个空行，尤其是如果这些选项在不滚动的情况下不再适合您的屏幕时。

trans-unit.target: Vue.js插件应公开 install 方法。该方法将以 Vue 构造函数作为第一个参数以及可能的选项进行调用：

trans-unit.source: A benefit of functional components over partials is that they can be much more dynamic, because they grant you access to the full power of JavaScript. There is a cost to this power however. If you’ve never used a component framework with render functions before, they may take a bit longer to learn.
trans-unit.target: 功能组件优于部分组件的好处是它们可以更加动态，因为它们使您可以访问JavaScript的全部功能。然而，这种力量是有代价的。如果您以前从未使用过带有渲染功能的组件框架，那么它们可能需要花费更长的时间来学习。

trans-unit.source: A common need for data binding is manipulating an element’s class list and its inline styles. Since they are both attributes, we can use v-bind to handle them: we only need to calculate a final string with our expressions. However, meddling with string concatenation is annoying and error-prone. For this reason, Vue provides special enhancements when v-bind is used with class and style. In addition to strings, the expressions can also evaluate to objects or arrays.
trans-unit.target: 数据绑定的常见需求是处理元素的类列表及其内联样式。由于它们都是属性，因此我们可以使用 v-bind 来处理它们：我们只需要使用表达式来计算最终字符串。但是，干预字符串连接很烦人并且容易出错。因此，当 v-bind 与 class 和 style 一起使用时，Vue提供了特殊的增强功能。除了字符串外，表达式还可以求值为对象或数组。

trans-unit.source: A component can have as many props as you’d like and by default, any value can be passed to any prop. In the template above, you’ll see that we can access this value on the component instance, just like with data.
trans-unit.target: 一个组件可以具有任意数量的道具，并且默认情况下，任何值都可以传递给任何道具。在上面的模板中，您将看到我们可以像使用 data 一样在组件实例上访问此值。

trans-unit.source: A component like the above will result in a “max stack size exceeded” error, so make sure recursive invocation is conditional (i.e. uses a v-if that will eventually be false).
trans-unit.target: 类似于上述的组件将导致“超出最大堆栈大小”错误，因此请确保递归调用是有条件的（即，使用 v-if 最终将为 false ）。

trans-unit.source: A static type system can help prevent many potential runtime errors, especially as applications grow. That’s why Vue ships with official type declarations for TypeScript - not only in Vue core, but also for vue-router and vuex as well.
trans-unit.target: 静态类型的系统可以帮助防止许多潜在的运行时错误，尤其是随着应用程序的增长。因此，Vue附带了TypeScript的正式类型声明 -不仅在Vue核心中，而且还在vue-router和vuex中。

trans-unit.source: Adds a property to a reactive object, ensuring the new property is also reactive, so triggers view updates. This must be used to add new properties to reactive objects, as Vue cannot detect normal property additions (e.g. this.myObject.newProperty = 'hi').
trans-unit.target: 向响应对象添加属性，确保新属性也响应，因此触发视图更新。由于Vue无法检测到正常的属性添加，因此必须使用它来向反应对象添加新属性（例如， this.myObject.newProperty = 'hi' ）。

trans-unit.source: After adding functional: true, updating the render function of our anchored heading component would require adding the context argument, updating this.$slots.default to context.children, then updating this.level to context.props.level.
trans-unit.target: 添加 functional: true ，更新锚定标题组件的render函数将需要添加 context 参数，将 this.$slots.default 更新为 context.children ，然后将 this.level 更新为 context.props.level 。

trans-unit.source: After including the above code as a declaration file (like my-property.d.ts) in your project, you can use $myProperty on a Vue instance.
trans-unit.target: 在将上述代码作为声明文件（如 my-property.d.ts ）包含在项目中之后，可以在Vue实例上使用 $myProperty 。

trans-unit.source: Aliasing createElement to h is a common convention you’ll see in the Vue ecosystem and is actually required for JSX. Starting with version 3.4.0 of the Babel plugin for Vue, we automatically inject const h = this.$createElement in any method and getter (not functions or arrow functions), declared in ES2015 syntax that has JSX, so you can drop the (h) parameter. With prior versions of the plugin, your app would throw an error if h was not available in the scope.
trans-unit.target: 将 createElement 别名为 h 是Vue生态系统中常见的约定，实际上是JSX所必需的。从Vue的Babel插件版本3.4.0开始，我们会自动以任何方法和getter（不是函数或箭头函数）注入 const h = this.$createElement ，并以具有JSX的ES2015语法声明，因此您可以删除 (h) 参数。使用该插件的早期版本，如果 h 在范围内不可用，则您的应用程序将引发错误。

trans-unit.source: All $slots are now also exposed on $scopedSlots as functions. If you work with render functions, it is now recommended to always access slots via $scopedSlots, whether they currently use a scope or not. This will not only make future refactors to add a scope simpler, but also ease your eventual migration to Vue 3, where all slots will be functions.
trans-unit.target: 现在，所有 $slots 也都在 $scopedSlots 作为函数公开。如果使用渲染功能，现在建议始终通过 $scopedSlots 访问插槽，无论它们当前是否使用范围。这不仅使将来的重构操作更加简单，而且还简化了最终移植到Vue 3的工作，在Vue 3中，所有插槽都将起作用。

trans-unit.source: All UMD builds can be used directly as an AMD module.
trans-unit.target: 所有的UMD构建都可以直接作为AMD模块使用。

trans-unit.source: All VNodes in the component tree must be unique. That means the following render function is invalid:

trans-unit.source: All lifecycle hooks automatically have their this context bound to the instance, so that you can access data, computed properties, and methods. This means you should not use an arrow function to define a lifecycle method (e.g. created: () => this.fetchTodos()). The reason is arrow functions bind the parent context, so this will not be the Vue instance as you expect and this.fetchTodos will be undefined.
trans-unit.target: 所有生命周期挂钩都会自动将其 this 上下文绑定到实例，以便您可以访问数据，计算的属性和方法。这意味着您不应该使用箭头函数来定义生命周期方法（例如， created: () => this.fetchTodos() ）。原因是箭头函数绑定了父上下文，因此 this 将不是您期望的Vue实例，并且 this.fetchTodos 将是未定义的。

trans-unit.source: All of these are either already stored as raw numbers or can be converted into numbers. Once we do that, we can animate these state changes using 3rd-party libraries to tween state, in combination with Vue’s reactivity and component systems.
trans-unit.target: 所有这些要么已经存储为原始数字，要么可以转换为数字。完成此操作后，我们可以结合使用Vue的反应性和组件系统，使用3rd-party库对这些状态更改进行动画处理以补间状态。

trans-unit.source: All of these are solved by single-file components with a .vue extension, made possible with build tools such as Webpack or Browserify.
trans-unit.target: 所有这些都是要解决单一文件组件与 .vue 扩展，成为可能与构建工具如的WebPack或Browserify。

trans-unit.source: All props form a one-way-down binding between the child property and the parent one: when the parent property updates, it will flow down to the child, but not the other way around. This prevents child components from accidentally mutating the parent’s state, which can make your app’s data flow harder to understand.
trans-unit.target: 所有道具在子属性和父属性之间形成单向绑定：当父属性更新时，它将向下流到子属性，但不会反过来。这样可以防止子组件意外更改父组件的状态，这会使您的应用程序数据流更难以理解。

trans-unit.source: All routing mode options have been condensed into a single mode option. Update:
trans-unit.target: 所有路由模式选项都已浓缩为单个 mode 选项。更新：

trans-unit.source: All subcomponents will now be able to access this instance and use it as a global store:
trans-unit.target: 现在,所有的子组件将能够访问这个实例,并将其作为全局存储使用。

trans-unit.source: All the features on this page document the handling of edge cases, meaning unusual situations that sometimes require bending Vue’s rules a little. Note however, that they all have disadvantages or situations where they could be dangerous. These are noted in each case, so keep them in mind when deciding to use each feature.
trans-unit.target: 此页面上的所有功能均记录了边缘情况的处理，这意味着异常情况有时需要稍微折弯Vue规则。但是请注意，它们都有缺点或可能会造成危险的情况。在每种情况下都应注意这些内容，因此在决定使用每个功能时请记住它们。

trans-unit.source: Allow the component to recursively invoke itself in its template. Note that when a component is registered globally with Vue.component(), the global ID is automatically set as its name.
trans-unit.target: 允许组件在其模板中递归调用自身。请注意，当使用 Vue.component() 在全局范围内注册组件时，全局ID将自动设置为其名称。

trans-unit.source: Allows a custom component to customize the prop and event used when it’s used with v-model. By default, v-model on a component uses value as the prop and input as the event, but some input types such as checkboxes and radio buttons may want to use the value prop for a different purpose. Using the model option can avoid the conflict in such cases.
trans-unit.target: 允许自定义组件自定义与 v-model 一起使用的prop和event 。默认情况下，组件上的 v-model 将 value 用作属性，将 input 作为事件，但是某些输入类型（例如复选框和单选按钮）可能希望将 value 属性用于其他目的。在这种情况下，使用 model 选项可以避免冲突。

trans-unit.source: Allows declaratively extending another component (could be either a plain options object or a constructor) without having to use Vue.extend. This is primarily intended to make it easier to extend between single file components.
trans-unit.target: 允许以声明方式扩展另一个组件（可以是纯选项对象或构造函数），而不必使用 Vue.extend 。这主要是为了使在单个文件组件之间扩展更容易。

trans-unit.source: Although filters within text interpolations are still allowed, all of the filters have been removed. Instead, it’s recommended to use more specialized libraries for solving problems in each domain (e.g. date-fns to format dates and accounting for currencies).
trans-unit.target: 尽管仍然允许在文本插值中使用过滤器，但已删除所有过滤器。相反，建议使用更专业的库来解决每个域中的问题（例如，使用 date-fns 格式化日期和 accounting 货币）。

trans-unit.source: Although not strictly associated with the MVVM pattern, Vue’s design was partly inspired by it. As a convention, we often use the variable vm (short for ViewModel) to refer to our Vue instance.
trans-unit.target: 尽管未严格与MVVM模式相关联，但Vue的设计部分受其启发。按照惯例，我们经常使用变量 vm （ViewModel的缩写）来引用我们的Vue实例。

trans-unit.source: An errorCaptured hook can return false to prevent the error from propagating further. This is essentially saying “this error has been handled and should be ignored.” It will prevent any additional errorCaptured hooks or the global config.errorHandler from being invoked for this error.
trans-unit.target: 一个 errorCaptured 钩可以返回 false 以阻止错误的进一步传播。这实际上是在说“此错误已得到处理，应该忽略。” 它将防止为此错误调用任何其他 errorCaptured 挂钩或全局 config.errorHandler 。

trans-unit.source: An alternative to string templates allowing you to leverage the full programmatic power of JavaScript. The render function receives a createElement method as it’s first argument used to create VNodes.
trans-unit.target: 字符串模板的替代方法，使您可以利用JavaScript的全部编程功能。render函数接收一个 createElement 方法作为它用于创建 VNode 的第一个参数。

trans-unit.target: 理想的Vue应用程序是支撑道具，关闭事件。遵循此约定可使您的组件更容易理解。但是，在某些情况下，prop突变或 this.$parent 可以简化已经深入耦合的两个组件。

trans-unit.source: An important note about the ref registration timing: because the refs themselves are created as a result of the render function, you cannot access them on the initial render - they don’t exist yet! $refs is also non-reactive, therefore you should not attempt to use it in templates for data-binding.
trans-unit.target: 关于ref注册时间的重要说明：由于ref本身是通过render函数创建的，因此您不能在初始渲染时访问它们-它们尚不存在！ $refs 也是非反应性的，因此您不应尝试在模板中使用它来进行数据绑定。

trans-unit.source: An object representing the current props a component has received. The Vue instance proxies access to the properties on its props object.

trans-unit.source: An object where keys are expressions to watch and values are the corresponding callbacks. The value can also be a string of a method name, or an Object that contains additional options. The Vue instance will call $watch() for each entry in the object at instantiation.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，其中键是要监视的表达式，值是相应的回调。该值也可以是方法名称的字符串，也可以是包含其他选项的对象。Vue实例将在实例化时为对象中的每个条目调用 $watch() 。

Angular (前称Angular 2)

trans-unit.source: Angular essentially requires using TypeScript, given that almost all its documentation and learning resources are TypeScript-based. TypeScript has its benefits - static type checking can be very useful for large-scale applications, and can be a big productivity boost for developers with backgrounds in Java and C#.
trans-unit.target: 考虑到Angular几乎所有的文档和学习资源都是基于TypeScript,因此Angular本质上需要使用TypeScript。TypeScript有它的好处--静态类型检查对于大型应用程序来说非常有用,对于有Java和C#背景的开发人员来说,可以极大地提高工作效率。

trans-unit.source: Angular’s learning curve is much steeper. The API surface of the framework is huge and as a user you will need to familiarize yourself with a lot more concepts before getting productive. The complexity of Angular is largely due to its design goal of targeting only large, complex applications - but that does make the framework a lot more difficult for less-experienced developers to pick up.
trans-unit.target: Angular的学习曲线要​​陡峭得多。框架的API面很大，作为用户，您需要先熟悉很多概念，然后再进行生产。Angular的复杂性很大程度上是由于其设计目标仅针对大型，复杂的应用程序-但这确实使经验不足的开发人员更难以使用该框架。
AngularJS (Angular 1)

trans-unit.source: AngularJS has strong opinions about how your applications should be structured, while Vue is a more flexible, modular solution. While this makes Vue more adaptable to a wide variety of projects, we also recognize that sometimes it’s useful to have some decisions made for you, so that you can just start coding.
trans-unit.target: AngularJS对应用程序的结构有强烈的意见，而Vue是一种更灵活的模块化解决方案。尽管这使Vue更适合各种项目，但我们也认识到有时为您制定一些决策很有用，这样您就可以开始编码了。

trans-unit.source: AngularJS uses two-way binding between scopes, while Vue enforces a one-way data flow between components. This makes the flow of data easier to reason about in non-trivial applications.
trans-unit.target: AngularJS在作用域之间使用双向绑定,而Vue则强制执行组件之间的单向数据流。这使得数据流在非琐碎的应用中更容易推理。

trans-unit.source: Another advantage of this approach is there will be times when debouncing isn’t quite the right wrapper function. For example, when hitting an API for search suggestions, waiting to offer suggestions until after the user has stopped typing for a period of time isn’t an ideal experience. What you probably want instead is a throttling function. Now since you’re already using a utility library like lodash, refactoring to use its throttle function instead takes only a few seconds.
trans-unit.target: 这种方法的另一个优点是，有时反跳功能并不是正确的包装函数。例如，当点击API搜索建议时，等到用户停止输入一段时间后才提供建议并不是理想的体验。相反，您可能想要的是节流功能。现在，由于您已经在使用lodash之类的实用程序库，因此重构重构仅需几秒钟即可使用其 throttle 功能。

trans-unit.source: Another benefit of specifying a name option is debugging. Named components result in more helpful warning messages. Also, when inspecting an app in the vue-devtools, unnamed components will show up as <AnonymousComponent>, which isn’t very informative. By providing the name option, you will get a much more informative component tree.
trans-unit.target: 指定 name 选项的另一个好处是调试。命名的组件会产生更有用的警告消息。另外，当在vue-devtools中检查应用程序时，未命名的组件将显示为 <AnonymousComponent> ，这不是很有用。通过提供 name 选项，您将获得更多信息的组件树。

trans-unit.source: Another important difference between these offerings is that Vue’s companion libraries for state management and routing (among other concerns) are all officially supported and kept up-to-date with the core library. React instead chooses to leave these concerns to the community, creating a more fragmented ecosystem. Being more popular though, React’s ecosystem is considerably richer than Vue’s.
trans-unit.target: 这些产品之间的另一个重要区别是，Vue的状态管理和路由伴侣库（除其他问题外）均得到正式支持，并与核心库保持最新。相反，React选择将这些问题留给社区，从而创建一个更加分散的生态系统。尽管更受欢迎，React的生态系统比Vue的生态系统丰富得多。

trans-unit.source: As promised, we can also use preprocessors such as Pug, Babel (with ES2015 modules), and Stylus for cleaner and more feature-rich components.

trans-unit.source: As we continue developing the convention where components are never allowed to directly mutate state that belongs to a store, but should instead dispatch events that notify the store to perform actions, we eventually arrive at the Flux architecture. The benefit of this convention is we can record all state mutations happening to the store and implement advanced debugging helpers such as mutation logs, snapshots, and history re-rolls / time travel.
trans-unit.target: 随着我们继续制定约定，从不允许组件直接改变属于商店的状态，而应该分派通知商店执行操作的事件，我们最终到达了Flux体系结构。这种约定的好处是我们可以记录发生在商店中的所有状态突变，并实现高级调试助手，例如突变日志，快照和历史记录重新滚动/时间旅行。

trans-unit.source: As we develop our <blog-post> component, some features may require communicating back up to the parent. For example, we may decide to include an accessibility feature to enlarge the text of blog posts, while leaving the rest of the page its default size:

trans-unit.source: By default, Vue updates the DOM as efficiently as possible. That means when switching between elements of the same type, it simply patches the existing element, rather than removing it and adding a new one in its place. This can have unintended consequences if these elements should not actually be considered the same.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，Vue尽可能高效地更新DOM。这意味着在相同类型的元素之间切换时，它只是修补现有元素，而不是删除它并在其位置添加一个新元素。如果实际上不应将这些元素视为相同，则会产生意想不到的后果。

trans-unit.source: By default, all errors are still sent to the global config.errorHandler if it is defined, so that these errors can still be reported to an analytics service in a single place.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，所有错误仍将发送到全局 config.errorHandler (如果已定义），因此仍可以将这些错误报告给单个位置的分析服务。

trans-unit.source: By default, parent scope attribute bindings that are not recognized as props will “fallthrough” and be applied to the root element of the child component as normal HTML attributes. When authoring a component that wraps a target element or another component, this may not always be the desired behavior. By setting inheritAttrs to false, this default behavior can be disabled. The attributes are available via the $attrs instance property (also new in 2.4) and can be explicitly bound to a non-root element using v-bind.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，未被识别为props的父范围属性绑定将“掉线”，并作为普通HTML属性应用于子组件的根元素。在创作包装目标元素或其他组件的组件时，这可能并非总是期望的行为。通过将 inheritAttrs 设置为 false ，可以禁用此默认行为。这些属性可以通过 $attrs 实例属性（在2.4中也是新增功能）使用，并且可以使用 v-bind 显式绑定到非根元素。

trans-unit.source: Called after a Vue instance has been destroyed. When this hook is called, all directives of the Vue instance have been unbound, all event listeners have been removed, and all child Vue instances have also been destroyed.
trans-unit.target: 在Vue实例被销毁后调用。当这个钩子被调用时,Vue实例的所有指令都已被解绑,所有事件监听器都已被移除,所有的子Vue实例也已被销毁。

trans-unit.source: Called after a data change causes the virtual DOM to be re-rendered and patched.
trans-unit.target: 在数据变更后调用,会导致虚拟DOM被重新渲染和修补。

trans-unit.source: Called after the instance has been mounted, where el is replaced by the newly created vm.$el. If the root instance is mounted to an in-document element, vm.$el will also be in-document when mounted is called.
trans-unit.target: 在实例挂载后调用，其中 el 被新创建的 vm.$el 替换。如果将根实例安装到文档中元素，则在调用 mounted 时， vm.$el 也将是文档中。

trans-unit.source: Called right before a Vue instance is destroyed. At this stage the instance is still fully functional.
trans-unit.target: 在Vue实例被销毁之前调用。在这个阶段,实例仍然是完全可以使用的。

trans-unit.source: Called right before the mounting begins: the render function is about to be called for the first time.
trans-unit.target: 在安装开始之前立即调用： render 函数即将被首次调用。

trans-unit.source: Called synchronously after the instance is created. At this stage, the instance has finished processing the options which means the following have been set up: data observation, computed properties, methods, watch/event callbacks. However, the mounting phase has not been started, and the $el property will not be available yet.
trans-unit.target: 创建实例后同步调用。在此阶段，实例已完成对选项的处理，这意味着已设置以下内容：数据观察，计算的属性，方法，监视/事件回调。但是，安装阶段尚未开始，并且 $el 属性尚不可用。

trans-unit.source: Called synchronously immediately after the instance has been initialized, before data observation and event/watcher setup.
trans-unit.target: 在实例初始化后,在数据观察和事件/监视者设置之前,立即同步调用。

trans-unit.source: Called when a kept-alive component is activated.
trans-unit.target: 当一个保持-活的组件被激活时被调用。

trans-unit.source: Called when a kept-alive component is deactivated.
trans-unit.target: 当一个保持-活组件被停用时调用。

trans-unit.source: Called when an error from any descendent component is captured. The hook receives three arguments: the error, the component instance that triggered the error, and a string containing information on where the error was captured. The hook can return false to stop the error from propagating further.
trans-unit.target: 当捕获到任何后代组件的错误时调用。该挂钩接收三个参数：错误，触发错误的组件实例以及包含有关捕获错误的位置信息的字符串。挂钩可以返回 false ,以阻止错误进一步传播。

trans-unit.source: Called when data changes, before the DOM is patched. This is a good place to access the existing DOM before an update, e.g. to remove manually added event listeners.
trans-unit.target: 当数据发生变化时,在DOM被修补之前调用。这是一个很好的地方,可以在更新之前访问现有的DOM,比如删除手动添加的事件监听器。

trans-unit.source: CommonJS and ES Module builds also preserve raw checks for process.env.NODE_ENV to determine the mode they should run in. You should use appropriate bundler configurations to replace these environment variables in order to control which mode Vue will run in. Replacing process.env.NODE_ENV with string literals also allows minifiers like UglifyJS to completely drop the development-only code blocks, reducing final file size.
trans-unit.target: CommonJS和ES Module版本还保留了对 process.env.NODE_ENV 的原始检查，以确定它们应以哪种模式运行。您应该使用适当的捆绑程序配置来替换这些环境变量，以便控制Vue将以哪种模式运行。替换 process.env.NODE_ENV 与字符串文字也让像UglifyJS minifiers完全删除该只开发代码块，减少了最终文件大小。

trans-unit.source: CommonJS and ES Module builds are intended for bundlers, therefore we don’t provide minified versions for them. You will be responsible for minifying the final bundle yourself.

trans-unit.source: Debouncing is used to limit how often we execute Ajax requests and other expensive operations. Vue’s debounce attribute parameter for v-model made this easy for very simple cases, but it actually debounced state updates rather than the expensive operations themselves. It’s a subtle difference, but it comes with limitations as an application grows.
trans-unit.target: 防反跳用于限制我们执行Ajax请求和其他昂贵操作的频率。Vue的 v-model 的 debounce 属性参数在非常简单的情况下使此操作变得容易，但是实际上它对状态更新进行了反抖动，而不是昂贵的操作本身。这是一个细微的差异，但是随着应用程序的增长，它会受到限制。

trans-unit.source: Directives are special attributes with the v- prefix. Directive attribute values are expected to be a single JavaScript expression (with the exception of v-for, which will be discussed later). A directive’s job is to reactively apply side effects to the DOM when the value of its expression changes. Let’s review the example we saw in the introduction:
trans-unit.target: 指令是带有 v- 前缀的特殊属性。指令属性值应该是单个JavaScript表达式（ v-for 除外，这将在后面讨论）。指令的工作是在其表达式的值发生更改时以响应方式将副作用施加到DOM。让我们回顾一下在引言中看到的示例：

trans-unit.source: Directives have a greatly reduced scope of responsibility: they are now only used for applying low-level direct DOM manipulations. In most cases, you should prefer using components as the main code-reuse abstraction.
trans-unit.target: 指令的责任范围大大缩小了:它们现在只用于应用低级的直接DOM操作。在大多数情况下,你应该选择使用组件作为主要的代码重用抽象。

trans-unit.source: Directives no longer have instances. This means there’s no more this inside directive hooks. Instead, they receive everything they might need as arguments. If you really must persist state across hooks, you can do so on el.
trans-unit.target: 指令不再具有实例。这意味着没有更多的 this 内部指令挂钩。相反，他们收到了可能需要的所有参数。如果确实必须跨钩子保持状态，则可以在 el 上进行。

trans-unit.source: Don’t use arrow functions on an options property or callback, such as created: () => console.log(this.a) or vm.$watch('a', newValue => this.myMethod()). Since an arrow function doesn’t have a this, this will be treated as any other variable and lexically looked up through parent scopes until found, often resulting in errors such as Uncaught TypeError: Cannot read property of undefined or Uncaught TypeError: this.myMethod is not a function.
trans-unit.target: 不要在options属性或回调中使用箭头函数，例如 created: () => console.log(this.a) 或 vm.$watch('a', newValue => this.myMethod()) 。由于箭头功能不具有 this ， this 将被视为任何其他变量，词汇抬头通过父范围，直到找到，往往会造成错误，如 Uncaught TypeError: Cannot read property of undefined 或 Uncaught TypeError: this.myMethod is not a function 。

trans-unit.source: Don’t use .passive and .prevent together, because .prevent will be ignored and your browser will probably show you a warning. Remember, .passive communicates to the browser that you don’t want to prevent the event’s default behavior.
trans-unit.target: 请勿同时使用 .passive 和 .prevent ，因为 .prevent 将被忽略，并且您的浏览器可能会向您显示警告。请记住， .passive 浏览器传达你不想要阻止事件的默认行为。

trans-unit.source: Don’t use non-primitive values like objects and arrays as v-for keys. Use string or numeric values instead.
trans-unit.target: 不要将对象和数组之类的非原始值用作 v-for 键。请改用字符串或数字值。

trans-unit.source: Don’t use the minified version during development. You will miss out on all the nice warnings for common mistakes!

Since Vue performs the getter/setter conversion process during instance initialization, a property must be present in the data object in order for Vue to convert it and make it reactive. For example:

trans-unit.source: ESM for browsers (2.6+ only): intended for direct imports in modern browsers via <script type="module">.

trans-unit.source: ESM for bundlers: intended for use with modern bundlers like webpack 2 or Rollup. ESM format is designed to be statically analyzable so the bundlers can take advantage of that to perform “tree-shaking” and eliminate unused code from your final bundle. The default file for these bundlers (pkg.module) is the Runtime only ES Module build (vue.runtime.esm.js).
trans-unit.target: 捆绑器的 ESM：旨在与现代捆绑器（例如webpack 2或Rollup）一起使用。ESM格式设计为可静态分析的，因此捆绑器可以利用它来进行“摇树”，并从最终捆绑中消除未使用的代码。这些 pkg.module 的默认文件（pkg.module）是仅运行时ES模块构建（ vue.runtime.esm.js ）。

trans-unit.source: Each Vue instance goes through a series of initialization steps when it’s created - for example, it needs to set up data observation, compile the template, mount the instance to the DOM, and update the DOM when data changes. Along the way, it also runs functions called lifecycle hooks, giving users the opportunity to add their own code at specific stages.
trans-unit.target: 每个Vue实例在创建时都会经历一系列初始化步骤-例如，它需要设置数据观察，编译模板，将实例安装到DOM以及在数据更改时更新DOM。在此过程中，它还运行称为生命周期挂钩的函数，使用户有机会在特定阶段添加自己的代码。

Ember

trans-unit.source: Ember is a full-featured framework that is designed to be highly opinionated. It provides a lot of established conventions and once you are familiar enough with them, it can make you very productive. However, it also means the learning curve is high and flexibility suffers. It’s a trade-off when you try to pick between an opinionated framework and a library with a loosely coupled set of tools that work together. The latter gives you more freedom but also requires you to make more architectural decisions.
trans-unit.target: Ember是功能齐全的框架，旨在引起人们的高度关注。它提供了许多已建立的约定，一旦您对它们足够熟悉，它将使您非常有效率。但是，这也意味着学习曲线很高并且灵活性受到损害。当您尝试在一个有思想的框架和一个具有松散耦合的工具集的库之间进行选择时，这是一个折衷。后者给您更多的自由，但也需要您做出更多的体系结构决策。

trans-unit.source: Every element is a node. Every piece of text is a node. Even comments are nodes! A node is just a piece of the page. And as in a family tree, each node can have children (i.e. each piece can contain other pieces).

trans-unit.source: Filters are JavaScript functions, therefore they can take arguments:

筛选器可以被连锁化。

trans-unit.source: Filters can now only be used inside text interpolations ({{ }} tags). In the past we’ve found using filters within directives such as v-model, v-on, etc led to more complexity than convenience. For list filtering on v-for, it’s also better to move that logic into JavaScript as computed properties, so that it can be reused throughout your component.
trans-unit.target: 过滤器现在只能在文本插值（ {{ }} 标签）内使用。过去，我们发现在指令（例如 v-model ， v-on 等）中使用过滤器会导致复杂性多于便利性。对于 v-for 上的列表过滤，最好将该逻辑作为计算的属性移到JavaScript中，以便可以在整个组件中重用它。

trans-unit.source: Finally, although not as deeply integrated with TypeScript as Angular is, Vue also offers official typings and official decorator for those who wish to use TypeScript with Vue. trans-unit.source: For example, when you set vm.someData = 'new value', the component will not re-render immediately. It will update in the next “tick”, when the queue is flushed. Most of the time we don’t need to care about this, but it can be tricky when you want to do something that depends on the post-update DOM state. Although Vue.js generally encourages developers to think in a “data-driven” fashion and avoid touching the DOM directly, sometimes it might be necessary to get your hands dirty. In order to wait until Vue.js has finished updating the DOM after a data change, you can use Vue.nextTick(callback) immediately after the data is changed. The callback will be called after the DOM has been updated. For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如，当您设置 vm.someData = 'new value' ，该组件将不会立即重新呈现。刷新队列后，它将在下一个“滴答”中更新。大多数时候，我们不需要关心这一点，但是当您想执行依赖于更新后DOM状态的操作时，这可能会很棘手。尽管Vue.js通常会鼓励开发人员以“数据驱动”的方式进行思考，并避免直接接触DOM，但有时可能有必要弄脏您的手。为了等到数据更改后Vue.js完成更新DOM，可以在数据更改后立即使用 Vue.nextTick(callback) 。 DOM更新后将调用回调。例如：

trans-unit.source: For large applications, both Vue and React offer robust routing solutions. The React community has also been very innovative in terms of state management solutions (e.g. Flux/Redux). These state management patterns and even Redux itself can be easily integrated into Vue applications. In fact, Vue has even taken this model a step further with Vuex, an Elm-inspired state management solution that integrates deeply into Vue that we think offers a superior development experience.
trans-unit.target: 对于大型应用程序，Vue和React均提供强大的路由解决方案。在状态管理解决方案（例如Flux / Redux）方面，React社区也非常创新。这些状态管理模式甚至Redux本身都可以轻松集成到Vue应用程序中。实际上，Vue甚至借助Vuex进一步推动了该模型的发展，Vuex是一种榆树启发的状态管理解决方案，已深深集成到Vue中，我们认为这提供了卓越的开发经验。
